website_summaries.verdict: Larger footplates and sturdy wheels make this rugged carver a great scooter to take for a spin.
pros: Larger, rugged, and slip-resistant foot plates
Concealed brake line fed through tube
cons: Can be difficult for children to learn how to get started
Boxes were damaged during shipping, but not the scooter
Difficult to get replacement parts, if needed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scooters for KIDS WITH AUTISM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a Scooteriffic Birthday party for our 13 year old who has Autism. He invited some friends who also have special needs. ALL kids had a blast!! Most of them, like our son cannot ride a bicycle, so this was an amazing experience for them!! My husband rides too!
customer_reviews.author: smismiss

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our 2nd fliker on April 5th 2019 after the first one broke. It’s June 10th 2019 and this 2nd one has broken in the exact same place as the last. The metal bolt on the side sheered off inside the metal pole. My son is 80lbs and an appropriate weight for the product. After seeing this same issue twice I see the company has a definite product issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Get the one with the square metal frame. They seem to be more sturdy. Very smooth ride. Kids love them they are 6, 9, and 35 years old Neighbors and family members asked about them and Bought them the next day. These will last a while. Flat ground is the best to ride on large hills the kids have to walk them up The brakes work very good too, for down hills and quick stops.
customer_reviews.author: Trudad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this because it was hard for us to keep up with our 6 year old when he was on his scooter. He is 61 and I am 59, but we never imagined we would have so much fun. It is very sturdy and well built. It is easy to handle once you get that hang of it. We didn't realize this was for tricks though. The first time I tried to turn a corner with a little speed I drifted about 6 feet! It was scary, but fun! My grands, as well as my 24 year old daughter love it too.
customer_reviews.author: t923

customer_reviews.title: Works great for adults
customer_reviews.text: Works great for adults! I’m a 225 lb. father and now I can ride with my girls now. Lots of fun and easy to ride. Just make sure to tighten the arms every now and then and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mosteller

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned welding
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to enjoy this product. Problem is if you really want to have extreme fun you need sound mechanics. However, after contacting support and warranty to make them aware of a manufacturer defect where the back left wheel is not welded square to the frame I have not made any progress. The misaligned welding has caused the back left wheel to ware much faster than the right wheel and turning one way vs. the other is not consistent. I am returning to Amazon because my issue has not been addressed by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Received and put together pretty easily. My 8 year old has a blast with this thing and so do I! It is so fun! All of our friends get a kick out of watching us ........... I can power the scooter using my hips - so it can provide me with a good work out at the same time - having fun. You could totally market this product as a work out tool!! LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy assembly, lots of fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to ride while I take my kids down the road. I was looking for a little more than just a bike ride. My kids have the small version of this, but everyone is fighting to ride this one. I can't believe how much fun it is. Would def purchase again!! Great quality and ride. I am 5ft 1in tall and about 140lbs. No issues riding this. Love the extra back wheels that catch you if you turn around too fast. It gives a drift motion to the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together with the enclosed hex key. Great size for 8 year old who is 54" tall and easy for parents to ride as well. It will be loads of fun for entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. McKie

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson loved this for his birthday last week. It was a big hit snd even though he is short and small for his size, he is a real trooper and jumped right on. Our driveway is rough, but on the garage floor it flew. I bought this based on the great reviews this product had. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend it. It's still new so not sure how it will hold up in the future. It is made well, so I am not expecting problems. Cheaper ones did not have good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I'm 30 years old and love riding it through my neighborhood. My two year old loves to stand on it and ride with me and my husband jogs besides us. It's great exercise and it's not hard on your knees like running. The only thing we had an issue with was getting three handle bar tight enough so it doesn't move while riding I did fall when that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: That scooter is sweet highly recommend. I bought it for my son for Christmas but I use it more than he does. Just be careful because you can eat your lunch if you aren't careful
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived so fast Put together quickly and easily. My granddaughter and my adult daughter had so much fun playing on it! The wheels glide easily and smooth. I paid attention to the weight recommendation. One reviewer said that the rider needed to be at least 100lb to maneuver the scooter. It is perfect for my 114 pound grand and my 140 lb daughter. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: TGRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Life of the party
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves this. We purchased it as a birthday present. It’s so fun and easy to use. Even his 4 year old cousin was able to use it and picked it up quickly. We brought it to the park and so many asked us what it was and where we got it.
customer_reviews.author: LCMC

customer_reviews.title: Great Ride
customer_reviews.text: These things are built great and everyone loves it. Rated for adult weights so as a parent I can horse around on it a bit, but wish they made a bigger one for adults. Good for kids and teens though, as long as they are not to tall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wortner

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson is crazy about his scooter and that is what it is all about. Happy grandson, happy grandfather.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this thing. We got it for him on his birthday this past April. From the time that we put it together, he has done nothing, but ride it every day when he is here. Like I said, he loves it. he has a bike, but since he got this scooter, it is like 5% time on the bike and 95% time on the scooter. Want to make a 9 year old crazy? Get this scooter. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: WVL

customer_reviews.title: REALLY FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old son asked for this. he LOVES it. Loves to "grift" and is just something different for him to ride. it's fun even in areas where there's not a lot of room. He spent hours on my parents' deck riding an "obstacle" course around chairs and planters. Good exercise and fun in one!
customer_reviews.author: Whitlig

customer_reviews.title: So fun we ordered another one!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old son for Christmas and he loves it! Him and his 11 year old sister keep fighting over it so we ordered another one for her :) I only wish it came in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was overjoyed
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so happy and excited Christmas morning when he saw what we gave him Christmas morning. The grandparents did good this year.
customer_reviews.author: ann H S

customer_reviews.title: So easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: 6 Year old granddaughter rode one at the skatepark and fell in love. They are so easy to ride. Christmas morning she hopped right on and started doing turns and rode it like a champ. HIGHLY recommend this scooter. Your kid will love it. I'm 52 and I could ride it too!
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Tires don't last
customer_reviews.text: We received the scooter mid May. Well constructed and fun to ride. My 120 lb. son rode it 10 times for about 45 minutes each time on paved roads exactly like the kid in the video. Since then it has been unusable because the rubber on the wheels have completely deteriorated. Check these photos.
customer_reviews.author: kevin mcpherrin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in 2018. In May 2020 we still love it. The whole family rides on it. So do all the neighborhood kids. And they ride rough lol. It's sturdy and fun. It gets chosen over and over in a neighborhood with electric scooters. This is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old loves this, it works very well and can even hold the weight of an adult. Only downfall is that it can't be rolled backwards, but that isnt a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ted H

customer_reviews.title: Who knows how long it will last??
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and had to get replacements 3 times. I only kept the 4th one only because my son couldn't bear to have to return it and wait for another one. The first two came defective with even the box all damaged. The last one we kept, we had a very hard time even assembling it but had to keep it for my son's sake. We'll see how long this lasts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fun ride!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. She is 9! She loves it! Sturdy enough for her 16 yr old brother to ride too. I had a little trouble tightening the handle bars, her Dad finished them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Alexander McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kid found it a lot of fun except for the fact that when he tried to do the wheelie he didn’t do it correctly or didn’t have his posture right and completely flipped over it’s on our Ring history but he immediately got up and continued riding The scooter for another two hours
customer_reviews.author: Robin Langseth

customer_reviews.title: back wheel assembly cracked in 9 months
customer_reviews.text: My son used this daily, but back wheel assembly cracked and replacement unavailable through Y-Volution. He weighs 80 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: LaGerEllo

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: This Y flicker is amazing. Kids and adults love it! Adjustable height. Both my 9 & 11 year old enjoy these wheels!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Scooter
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our Grandson who is 14 yrs old. He really likes it, & enjoys riding all around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Exercise
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to bought it. My family love it a lot that good Exercise for the legs. We have fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the kids 12yo and 6yo they love them and they are sturdy enough fir grownups too

customer_reviews.title: Lost a screw....
customer_reviews.text: After having this about a couple months it is now out of commission. A screw came out on the front tire and my son had to walk it home- there it sits in the garage....

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite toy!! He loves to ride this! Even fun for adults!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This scooter is so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for my son's birthday of a different brand. Our older son was using it more than our younger and he looked odd and disproportioned. We got this one (he's a tall 8 year old) and it is perfect. Now they ride together in our long driveway for hours.

customer_reviews.title: my boys love it even after a year

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Nice choice for pre-teens
customer_reviews.text: My son has had a blast with this. It’s heavy and sturdy and is a good size for pre-teens. I just wish it would fold up to transport.
customer_reviews.author: kw24027

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN! My kids love this
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH FUN! My kids love this. They love making turns, drifting and it's great exercise while being so much fun. I'd recommend this to anyone looking to add to their bike/scooter collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Woodhams

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and fun to ride!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is very well made. It's very heavy and easy to collapse. The only thing it lacks is locking mechanisms for the wheels when it's stationary. It does tend to move when slightly touched. But a good quality scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Hal D. Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: I need a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Theres a clicking sound everytime you sway to gain momentum. Checked all bolts are all tight but still clicking. Annoying

customer_reviews.title: New ride A. Ok
customer_reviews.text: The lift set up well. Looks sturdy Works well Grandson was happy

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: SO much fun! Easy to learn to ride. Bought for my (very tall for his age) 7 year old. He loves it. I've ridden it, as well as my husband, and I can attest that it is durable and FUN!! :)

customer_reviews.title: Impressive

product_meta.title: Yvolution Y Fliker Lift | Swing Wiggle Carving Scooter for Kids Age 7+
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE Y FLIKER - Yvolution is the Original Flicker Company that has become the standard by which all self-propelled scooters are measured. The Y Fliker Lift A3 is our ultimate with a lightweight frame and super grip-wheels for insane stunts.

WHEELIES & TRICKS - It's unique patented LIFT mechanism lets you pull off crazy wheelies and even drift sideways on two wheels. Simply lean back and feel the LIFT system engage while you leave everyone behind with handlebar spins and cool tricks.
FOLDABLE - In those brief moments when the scooter isn’t in use, the frame even folds down for carrying around town and easy storage at home or in the car..
SAFE & SECURE - Two decks instead of one and anti-slip footplates are designed to provide a strong grip for kids and more secure ride. There’s even a quick-response brake for increased control.
